title: Giro d’Italia Stage 2: Tadej Pogačar Stomps to Victory on First Summit Finish, Seizing Maglia Rosa
content:
Slovenian storms clear of all of his rivals on first summit finish after the drama of a puncture and a crash close to start of final climb.
